messages.messageBody:
Sorry everybody. I ment to send that to Kelly, not the whole group. I
sometimes get a little flustered when trying to send e-mail while doing
3 other things at the same time. Sorry about that. Heidi

messages.subject: conference question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kelly.  Just wanted to check and see how you re doing with the conference.  I had a fun thought inspired by a thread from Unschooling.com of something I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kelly. Just wanted to check and see how you're doing with the
conference. I had a fun thought inspired by a thread from
Unschooling.com of something I could do but I'll need to know about how
many people will be coming. What I'd like to do is this: dragonfly,
Sandra, and Anne have talked about the poem "Children Learn What They
Live and I'd like to print up a copy for everyone at the conference to
keep. It's not really much but it's a little something that everyone
can take home.

Also, I've decided to get Joe (our dog) professionally stripped since I
can't seem to get him finished. Can you give me any tips on how to find
someone who'll do a good job?

Aislinn sends a "Hello" to Duncan. She's very excited because 2 weeks
ago, she officially began swimming w/out her swimmy wings. Ever since
she heard about your party, it's become very important to her.

Hope all is going well...and congratulations on getting your house
painted. Heidi Case
